================
Fabric Scheduler
================

Artifact Scheduler for Microsoft Fabric
=======================================

A Python API wrapper for scheduling Fabric artifacts (Notebooks, Dataflows, Pipelines) using the Fabric REST API.

**Key Features**:

- Automated scheduling of Fabric artifacts (Notebooks, Dataflows, Pipelines)
- Input validation and error handling
- Multiple input methods (dictionary, CSV file, CSV string)
- Schedule management (create, retrieve, delete)
- Support for different schedule types (Daily, Weekly, Cron)

.. note::
    This package is designed exclusively for use within Microsoft Fabric notebooks and integrates with the Microsoft Fabric REST API.
